name: Diver.io - Fun games offline
description:
Top free games with racing fun run!
Be careful with animal crossing, they might hurt you!
Find any hole to go through and earn more coins!
Easy to control, tap and play!



● Compatibility and support
We're continuously HARD WORKING so that all phones run the game smoothly. Please report any issue you may experience on our facebook page

● Disclaimer
Diver.io is a free game but it contains mature content and optional in-app purchases for real money. You may want to keep it away from your kids, children and younger boys and girls
